summary: BuildRequest specified only an admin-only credit distribution page and explicitly constrained the change scope to avoid adding other features. The diff shows modifications that appear to add/expand multiple unrelated backend and frontend capabilities (credit purchase via blockchain verification, send BTC transfer system, transaction history UI, profile/onboarding, theme work, admin loading/credentials flows), which goes beyond the requested admin credit distribution page.

hallucinated_features.description: Blockchain deposit verification and credit purchase flow (e.g., purchaseCredits with verifyBlockchainDeposit and related blockchain API types).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to an admin-only credit distribution page; no request to add/modify credit purchase or blockchain verification features.
evidence: backend/main.mo (shows purchaseCredits and verifyBlockchainDeposit usage; blockchain request/response types)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions BuyCreditsPage and blockchain verification flow)

hallucinated_features.description: Send BTC transfer-request system (transfer requests, network fee estimation, verification dialogs, status lifecycle).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly says not to add new features beyond the admin credit distribution page.
evidence: backend/main.mo (defines SendBTCRequest, TransferStatus, transferRequests map, network fee variable)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions SendBtcPage, TransferHistoryTable, VerifyTransferDialog, network fee estimation)

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management/onboarding modal (get/save user profile, profile setup modal).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and outside the admin credit distribution page scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad UI/UX/theme and routing/navigation changes (global styles, tailwind config, router setup, dashboard/history pages, header/nav changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest scope is only admin credit distribution page and explicitly disallows adding extra features beyond that page.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (index.css, tailwind.config.js, App.tsx routing/auth gate, AppHeader nav, DashboardPage, HistoryPage, etc.)

hallucinated_features.description: Admin credentials page and enhanced admin loading/verification UX (AdminCredentialsPage, AdminAccessLoadingScreen, auto-redirect/refresh behaviors).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requested only an admin-only credit distribution page; these additional admin-only pages/flows were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Attribution footer addition with UTM tracking.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and unrelated to admin credit distribution page.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (AppLayout.tsx mentions caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking)
